AxFormControl.Name: CopyOfStaticText1
AxFormControl.Text: This demonstrates the use of the "Check" option. When using this option, the contents of the group will be enabled / disabled.

AxFormControl.Name: Group6
AxFormControl.Caption: If the group is checked then ...

AxFormControl.Name: CopyOfStaticText
AxFormControl.Text: This demonstrates the use of the "Hide" option. When using this option, the group can be collapsed / expanded by clicking the chevron

AxFormControl.Name: StaticText
AxFormControl.Text: This demonstrates the use of the "Radio" option. When using the radio option, the groups must reside inside another container (group, tab, or base form) and then only one of the groups with the radio option can be active at a time.

AxFormControl.Name: StaticText2
AxFormControl.Text: Groups inside of a nested container work as a separate group than those above.

AxFormControl.Name: CopyOfStaticText2
AxFormControl.Text: This demonstrates the use of the "Check" option and at the same time, makes the group collapsable. This is done by overloading the Clicked method and Expands / Collapses the group

AxFormControl.Name: CopyOfStaticText3
AxFormControl.Text: The options also support nested groups. In this example, the group with the check option is located inside the group with the radio option
